CatDescriptText: Rev. Dr. Loran man was a local radio and television news anchor.  He began his career as the first African American staff announcer in 1968 at KDKA Radio in Pittsburgh.  After ten years with KDKA he began working as a reporter for WIIC/ WPXI-TV for over twenty years.  Rev. Mann is also the founder of Pentecostal Temple Church of God in Christ in East Liberty.  He is also owner of the gospel radio station WGBN.
TitMainTitle: Rev. Dr. Loran Mann and holding microphone attached to KDKA Radio 1020 tape recorder
